channel.title: Need help: item2.java:124: randomDharok() is already defined in Item2

item.title: Need help: item2.java:124: randomDharok() is already defined in Item2
item.dc:creator: @crysis_touch crysis touch
item.description:
@crysis_touch wrote:

delta:

You already have the random’s added in item2.java

i’m relatively new to java, can you explin a little?

i’ve only got the [code]public static int Verac[] = {4760,4759,4758,4757,4756,4755,4754,4753};

public static int randomVerac()
{
	return Verac[(int)(Math.random()*Verac.length)];
}

public static int Ahrim[] = {4708,4709,4710,4711,4712,4713,4714,4715};

public static int randomAhrim()
{
	return Ahrim[(int)(Math.random()*Ahrim.length)];
}

public static int Dharok[] = {4716,4717,4718,4719,4720,4721,4722,4723};

public static int randomDharok()
{
	return Dharok[(int)(Math.random()*Dharok.length)];
}

public static int Karil[] = {4732,4733,4734,4735,4736,4737,4738,4739,4740,4741};

public static int randomKaril()
{
	return Karil[(int)(Math.random()*Karil.length)];
}

public static int Torag[] = {4745,4746,4747,4748,4749,4750,4751,4752};

public static int randomTorag()
{
	return Torag[(int)(Math.random()*Torag.length)];
}

public static int Guthans[] = {4724,4725,4726,4727,4728,4729,4730,4731};

public static int randomGuthans()
{
	return Guthans[(int)(Math.random()*Guthans.length)];
}

public static int Tztokjad[] = {773,6106,6107,6108,6109,6110,6111,2643};

public static int randomTztokjad()
{
	return Tztokjad[(int)(Math.random()*Tztokjad.length)];
}[/code] in once :S

item.title: Need help: item2.java:124: randomDharok() is already defined in Item2
item.dc:creator: @crysis_touch crysis touch
item.description:
@crysis_touch wrote:

i’m trying to get the barrows brothers to drop items corresponding to them (karil drops karil set armour) but i get this error in compiler:

item2.java:124: randomDharok() is already defined in Item2
public static int randomDharok()
                     ^
item2.java:129: randomVerac() is already defined in Item2
public static int randomVerac()
                     ^
item2.java:139: randomTorag() is already defined in Item2
public static int randomTorag()
                     ^
item2.java:144: randomKaril() is already defined in Item2
public static int randomKaril()
                     ^

heres the item2.java part of the file reffering tothe error:

[code]
public static int Verac[] = {4760,4759,4758,4757,4756,4755,4754,4753};

public static int randomVerac()
{
	return Verac[(int)(Math.random()*Verac.length)];
}

public static int Ahrim[] = {4708,4709,4710,4711,4712,4713,4714,4715};

public static int randomAhrim()
{
	return Ahrim[(int)(Math.random()*Ahrim.length)];
}

public static int Dharok[] = {4716,4717,4718,4719,4720,4721,4722,4723};

public static int randomDharok()
{
	return Dharok[(int)(Math.random()*Dharok.length)];
}

public static int Karil[] = {4732,4733,4734,4735,4736,4737,4738,4739,4740,4741};

public static int randomKaril()
{
	return Karil[(int)(Math.random()*Karil.length)];
}

public static int Torag[] = {4745,4746,4747,4748,4749,4750,4751,4752};

public static int randomTorag()
{
	return Torag[(int)(Math.random()*Torag.length)];
}

public static int Guthans[] = {4724,4725,4726,4727,4728,4729,4730,4731};

public static int randomGuthans()
{
	return Guthans[(int)(Math.random()*Guthans.length)];
}

public static int Tztokjad[] = {773,6106,6107,6108,6109,6110,6111,2643};

public static int randomTztokjad()
{
	return Tztokjad[(int)(Math.random()*Tztokjad.length)];
}[/code]

and heres the npchandler.java bit:

[code]if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomTztokjad(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2030) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomVerac(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomAhrim(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomDharok(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2028) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKaril(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2029) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomTorag(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2027) {
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomGuthans(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1,

GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}[/code]

anyone who can help me would be much appreciated ty.
